doc.title: Jackpot
doc.plot: It's hot and sunny. A lonesome beachcomber is skimming the beach, looking for that odd find. He's not very lucky today. His first digs turns up some things that haven't any particular value. After a much needed rest, the man continues his seemingly fruitless search. But then he he stumbles on something big, really big. His ears are almost blown up, so much iron is buried in the ground. This must be his lucky day.
